duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and improve existing infrastructure including autoscaling, supporting new services, and optimizing for cost efficiencies/authentication/search.
Build and Maintain Platform as a Service Offering using RedHat OpenShift.
Work with A&A Team to maintain security requirements for operation of systems.

education_certification.credential: Active Top Secret Clearance with SCI eligibility and the ability to obtain a CI Polygraph.
Current DoD IAT II Level certification or the ability to successfully obtain one within 90 days of hire.
